testcase.name: Save Address for Customer
testcase.system-out: Given User is on SignIn Page................................................passed Then User enters username and password and click on Sign IN.................passed Then User is on MyAccountPage...............................................passed Then User Click on My Address button........................................passed Then User Clicks on Add a New Address button................................passed Then User enters CustomerAddress and click on Save..........................passed Then Validate the New Address by capturing Header...........................passed Then Close the Browser......................................................passed
